name: St. Expedito, hear my plea
description:
/My San Expedito, help me to overcome these difficult hours, protect me from all those who can harm me, protect my family, attend to my request urgently. Give me back my peace and tranquility, my San Expedito! I will be grateful for the rest of my life and I will spread your name to all those who have Faith./

San Expedito is one of the most popular saints in Argentina. He is the saint of just and urgent causes.

In times of hopelessness and extreme suffering, faith plays a very important role. For a long time I thought that faith was not something that was going to mobilize me but life always surprises you and after very hard moments San Expedito helped to alleviate some of the pain.

In Buenos Aires you can see in many neighborhoods "pasacalles" (banners in the street) with slogans of gratitude. Somehow this piece is to thank him: 

Thank you San Expedito for the favors conceived.
-The Delmas Family

𝘓𝘢 𝘋𝘦𝘭𝘮𝘢𝘴 (@𝘭𝘢_𝘥𝘦𝘭𝘮𝘢𝘴) 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘵𝘩𝘦 '𝘖𝘶𝘳 𝘔𝘺𝘵𝘩𝘴' 𝘦𝘹𝘩𝘪𝘣𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘩𝘦𝘭𝘥 𝘣𝘺 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘊𝘏𝘌𝘕 𝘢𝘳𝘵𝘪𝘴𝘵 𝘤𝘰𝘭𝘭𝘦𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘦
